job description:
Join one of the top pharmaceuticalpanies in the world develop a forecasting model to predict the emotional effects of prescribed narcotics. This is cutting-edge research that will change the way people view the importance of mental health and the way we perceive prescription drugs. One of their offices is in Radnor Pennsylvania and looking to hire a Principal Data Scientist to build out a team and take on this difficult challenge. They must have experience with designing optimization models, machine learning tools and implementing a Hadoop environment (Kafka is a plus).

Required Skills & Experience
  • 3 or more years experience using Machine learning
  • Must have a Masters degree in biology
  • Extensive experience with optimization models
  • Working and implementing a Hadoop environment
  • Experience with Python libraries (NumPy, SciPy, Pandas)

  • 30% Team Collaboration
